property.name: multiple
property.hint: The value is used to enable multiple choice for list selector control.The default value is "false" which means multiple choice is not allowed.

property.name: option
property.hint: Input option for select contorl,like label1=value1;label2=value2

property.name: submitMethod
property.hint: Method to submit data: "standard" is the normal method to submit a form, when "special", data is submitted like name=a,b,c
